name: discord
description: This is a front-end project where I developed a full home page repica of the Discord website. During this exercise I had to recreate the same template I received from the web designer

name: boolzapp
description: This is a front-end project where I developed a Whatsapp Web look alike app. During this exercise I had to implement some algorithms to search open chats and to update datetime (I used Luxon)

name: dc
description: There are two project about the DC website, one is made with Vue 3 and the other is made with Laravel 9. Both are handled with Vite

name: boolflix
description: In this project I made a replica of the home page of Netflix using The Movie Database (TMDB) API

name: minesweeper
description: These two project are the milestones of the creation of minewseeper game. In js-campominato-grid I did the generation of the game field and in the other one I've implemented the game

name: dropbox
description: This project I learn the utility of displaying elements in flex

name: locomotive
description: In the first project (js-biglietto-treno) I made the algorithm to buy a ticket where the price value is based on age and distance. The second part (js-biglietto-treno-form) is my first UI/UX project where I tried to make a full website of a old trains company that let you ride around the country just for fun

name: playstation
description: With this work I've made the front-end home page of the sony playstation website full responsive in all devices

name: yu-gi-oh!
description: This is one of the first project where I've worked with API REST. For this specific work I used ygoprodeck API

name: spotify
description: This is my first work full responsive (desktop-first) using media queries where I made a replica of the spotify web app

name: MaxCoach
description: This is the midterm front-end exam where I had to make this page of the portfolio based on a sketch of the web designer. After the deadline I had to do a presentation of the work

name: backoffice
description: In this project I've worked on a backoffice for my portfolio (check renatofringuello backoffice to see the real one)

name: BDoctor
description: This is my first project in team and it's the final course project where we had to work server-side, client-side and also at the presentation

name: renatofringuello.com
description: Also this portfolio is a project and I developed it by my self using everything I lernt during the Full-Stack Web Developer Course at Boolean Careers
